column1: #Text=If he 's looking for any of those issues to be addressed by the Democrats , they 're not going to be .

#Text=And I would hope he could also see that we 've got two people on the Supreme Court now that are , we hope , pro-life votes to overturn Roe versus Wade , that he will see that pro-life legislation was passed , that taxes were cut .
#Text=And what I would also say to him is that I think we also have to see that the system is built to spend .
#Text=I hear from Republicans and Independents alike that the biggest thing they 've been upset about , if you set aside opinions on the war , has been spending .
#Text=And the system 's just built to spend .
#Text=Whether Republicans or Democrats are in control , you just constantly get that .

#Text=I 've said many times — I ’ve represented Kansas since 1995 -- I have yet to have a single constituent come in my office and say , " Hey , we 're getting too much Federal money ; would you please cut it ? "
#Text=I get all the time people saying , " Look , I 'm a conservative , but we need this bridge , we need this subsidy , we need this hospital . ”
